Directions: Read the information in the box. Then answer each question that follows.
Content:
:box:Minors of the [African American] race, through their legal representatives, seek the aid of the courts in obtaining admission to the public schools of their community on a nonsegregated basis. In each instance, they had been denied admission to schools attended by white children under laws requiring or permitting segregation according to race.

	â€”from the Supreme Court decision in Brown v. Board of Education of Topeka, 1954
